mentions.tacticalSituation: Oxford West & Abingdon was the first stop on Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg's national campaign tour, highlighting how just one seat may tip the balance nationally and how the local ground campaign can make a difference with enthusiastic local supporters.

images.caption: Enthusiastic volunteers support Layla Moran's campaign.
BATTLE BUS: Oxford West & Abingdon was the first stop on Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg's national campaign tour.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet indicates a closely contested election and includes strategic campaign efforts such as the visit of a party leader, Nick Clegg, emphasizing the importance of the constituency in the national context.
